instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
直走經過左手邊的Abstract Group。
直走經過右手邊的Puget Systems。
目的地就在前方的 CenterGrid Virtual Studio。

target_info.display_name: CenterGrid Virtual Studio: CenterGrid Virtual Studio

companies.name: CenterGrid Virtual Studio
companies.description: CenterGrid's Virtual Studio provides high-powered GPU Workstations, Rendering Nodes, High Performance Storage and Network all wrapped with 24 x 7 management and support. We deliver Cloud services for VFX Virtual Production.  Our Virtual Studio is remote worker enabled. CenterGrid offers full-service technology solutions to US businesses that need an expert, trustworthy, and accountable partner. We are committed to excellence by providing continuous IT expertise, guidance, and problem-solving that ensures our customers enjoy a competitive advantage that enables them to succeed and scale effectively into the future.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, 3D Modeling, Animation/Film, Artifical Intelligence (AI), CAD/CAM/CAE/CIM, Data Visualization, Engineering Application, Game Engines, High Performance Graphics Processors, Networking Infrastructure, Online Network Services, Rendering & Modeling, Storage Devices, Streaming Technology, Visual Effects Software
